page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT AND LEISURE
page.content: Television provides the most entertainment in our area, as well as the broadcast programmes many people hire video tapes of feature films. The village hall in Alvingham is a very popular place, it is used for dances, social and youth clubs, play school and village meetings. Every Sunday it is open for families, there is a large hall for the children and a room with a bar for the adults. In order to see amateur dramatic productions, the cinema, concerts or recitals people have to go to Louth. For "Professional" theatre, Lincoln is the nearest. Louth is the nearest place for sports facilities, and has a swimming pool, sports hall, tennis and squash courts, a cricket pitch and a golf course.
